text:
Hi Pedram, 
Thanks for your messages above. I am interested in these roles but I will be honest about my schedule for now. 
I am available Mon-Wed. until Dec. because Thursday art class till Dec. and Fridays on another course until May2020. So by Jan. I will be wanting to work Mon-Thurs. from Jan.onwards. 
At this level job I am sure they want you to work 5 days a week. 
Also, I have heard about job sharing which some women are doing at DNeg in compositing. Have you heard of this?
Oh, no i havent heard about job sharing to be honest but it sounds like an interesting idea.
